snippet: The woman said that an assistant district attorney, Eli Cherkasky, assaulted her at a pub last Halloween after she yelled at him for touching her belongings.
abstract: Kirsten Schuck testifies in Manhattan Criminal Court that Eli Cherkasky, a Manhattan assistant district attorney, violently assaulted her inside a Midtown pub in 2014 after she chastised him for touching her purse; Cherkasky  faces up to three years in jail if convicted.
lead_paragraph: The woman said that an assistant district attorney, Eli Cherkasky, assaulted her at a pub last Halloween after she yelled at him for touching her belongings.

headline.main: Woman Testifies That Manhattan Prosecutor Choked Her at Bar
headline.print_headline: Woman Says Prosecutor Choked Her in Bar Dispute
